item.description:
This is in short notice to make the most of the 50% off offer from F1 Boston for a single race, which runs through until the 31st of this month

So... let's go racing at the indoor track at F1 Boston in Braintree.
www.f1boston.com

This time around on a Saturday.  We'll try to race on Track 2

Just arrive and drive. Racing suits, helmets and neck braces are provided by F1 Boston. No prior experience required. It's a blast if you are a first timer or a regular.

Let's hit the tracks.

Here's the coupon for 50% off your race package - http://www.push44.com/fzxma9yx - Print it out and bring it along.

The 50% off includes the day license + one race. The coupon expires 3/31/2011.

Good luck at the track.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the registration desk
item.name: Indoor racing @ F1 Boston
